page.title: 16 SALFORDS F & M SCHOOLS
page.content: The headmaster of the middle school is{Mr Bailey}and he has been at the school for nine years.He has{188 children and the numbers are increasing.There are{7}teaching staff with him and there are{7}classes.They have a football team.The children also play netball,rounders and other team games. {Mrs Methven}has been headmistres of Salfords First School for nearly {6}years.In the whole school there are {209}children.The First School like the Middle is a state school.In the school there are{7}fulltime teachers and{1\} part time teachers plus Mrs Methven. There are{7}classes in the school.They have a library which they made themselves for all of the children. There is an orchestra of recorders.
